title.narrative: Support to IDEG for the Referendum on Multiparty Local Governance in Ghana, 2019

description.narrative: To raise awareness and support mobilization of a high voter turn-out for the 17 December 2019 national referndum on amendment of Article 55(3) of the a992 Constitution

title.narrative: Above 40% voter turn-out for the 17 December national referendum on amendment of Article 55(3) of the 1992 Constitution.

description.narrative: December 2019: More than 40 percent of the electorate will turn out to vote in the 17 December national referendum on amendment of Article 55(3) of the 1992 Constitution.
